item.title: Machine Learning in Titanic
item.description: Created a Machine Learning model to predict survival outcomes of passengers Cleaned the data using Pandas; imputed missing values, created dummy variables Engineered features such as whether the passenger was onboard alone Used scikit-learn to develop models for prediction (RandomForests, DecisionTrees, K Neighbours etc.) The github repository: https://github.com/entekang/Titanic_ML
